articles.title: More seniors in Singapore get their Covid-19 jabs after vaccination teams go to the heartland - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Mobile vaccination teams sent to about 70 locations, from void decks to community clubs, have helped 4,900 people, including 3,340 seniors, get inoculated since last month. But with about 150,000 seniors aged 60 and above still to get their first …

articles.title: Tune in to Shopee 8.8 Mega Flash Sale TV Special to win up to ₱8 million worth of prizes - manilastandard.net
articles.description: Shopee, the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan, invites Filipinos to tune in to the Shopee 8.8 Mega Flash Sale TV Special on GMA-7 and Shopee Live today at 10:00 a.m. to 12:00nn.
